content: UC Pacific's June 2023 research memo details enrollment metrics for autoimmune drug trial NCT05678218. 42 participants with dual rheumatoid arthritis/lupus diagnoses were recruited from Mountain View Specialty Clinic referrals. Demographics show 83% female participants aged 28-45. Notable outlier: Participant FC-89235 required customized infusion scheduling due to transportation barriers stemming from rural Gilbert Canyon residency.
